## SavedObjectsTypeMappingDefinition.dynamic property

The dynamic property of the mapping. either `true`<!-- -->, `false` or 'strict'. Defaults to `false`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
dynamic?: boolean | 'strict';
```
